old_cites: Laet/Naber / Laet N / Laet port / Laet P
title: Historie ofte iaerlijck verhael van de verrichtinghen der geoctroyeerde West-Indische Compagnie, zedert haer begin, tot het eynde van 't jaer sesthien-hondert ses-en-dertich; begrepen in derthien boecken, ende met verscheyden koperen platen verciert
author: J. de Laet
description: [32], 544, 31, [11] pages, 28 unnumbered leaves of plates : illustrations, 15 maps
note: Laet N = Laet/Naber = version edited by S. P. l'Honoré Naber, *Iaerlyck verhael van de verrichtinghen der Geoctroyeerde West-Indische compagnie* [Hague, Mart. Nijhoff, 1931–37], 4 vols / Laet P = Laet port = Portuguese translation by Drs. Jose Hygino Duarte Pereira and Pedro Souto Maior, *Historia ou annaes dos feitos da Companhia privilegiada das Indias occidentaes desde o seu começo até ao fim do anno de 1636* [Rio de Janeiro, Officinas graphicas da Bibliotheca nacional, 1916-1925], 2 vols
